episodes.seriesTitle: REALITY BYTES with Stephanie Beatriz & Courtney Kocak
episodes.title: Jen Richards & Laura Zak on How to Get Over Your First Love | Full Ep out on Tues 3/7!
episodes.summary: REALITY BYTES is a new show about sex, love, relationships & dating in the digital age, hosted by best friends Stephanie Beatriz (Brooklyn Nine-Nine's Rosa Diaz) & Courtney Kocak (writer on Amazon's Danger & Eggs). Twenty-second full episode COMING 3/7 with friend of the show & hilarious standup comedian Steve Hernandez filling in for Steph to help Courtney interview Jen Richards & Laura Zak, co-creators of the Emmy-nominated web series Her Story, about queer dating culture… but first they answer a listener question about how to get over a first love. Please rate & review to tell us what you love! (Head to youtube.com/realitybytes for the video version of this episode.)

episodes.seriesTitle: REALITY BYTES with Stephanie Beatriz & Courtney Kocak
episodes.title: V-Day Live Show with Alexis G. Zall, Meghan Tonjes, & the Cast of Insecure | Full Ep
episodes.summary: REALITY BYTES is a new show about sex, love, relationships & dating in the digital age, hosted by best friends Stephanie Beatriz (Brooklyn Nine-Nine's Rosa Diaz) & Courtney Kocak (writer on Amazon's Danger & Eggs). The nineteenth full episode – our first ever live show, shot to be released on Valentine's Day because we love y'all so much – features YouTube stars Alexis G. Zall & Meghan Tonjes on ghosting, coming out, & body positivity, as well as showrunner Prentice Penny & cast members Yvonne Orji & Jay Ellis of HBO hit Insecure on long-term relationships, saving yourself for marriage, cheating, & WHAT THEY FUCK TO. Please rate & review to tell us what you love! (Head to youtube.com/realitybytes for the video version of this episode.)

episodes.title: Happy Thanksgiving from Reality Bytes!
episodes.summary: REALITY BYTES is a show about sex, love, relationships & dating in the digital age, hosted by best friends Stephanie Beatriz (Brooklyn Nine-Nine's Rosa Diaz) & Courtney Kocak (writer on Amazon's Danger & Eggs). We wish everyone a happy Thanksgiving! Enjoy your extra time with loved ones & catch up on old episodes with awesome guests like Gaby Dunn, Joe Lo Truglio, Melissa Fumero, Yassir Lester & Beth Stelling. We’ll be back Fri 11/25 all new with Emily V. Gordon! Please subscribe, plus rate & review to tell us what you love. (Head to youtube.com/realitybytes for the video version of this episode.)

episodes.summary: REALITY BYTES is a new show about sex, love, relationships & dating in the digital age, hosted by best friends Stephanie Beatriz (Brooklyn Nine-Nine's Rosa Diaz) & Courtney Kocak (writer on Amazon's Danger & Eggs). Third full episode COMING 10/4 with YouTube extraordinaire Gaby Dunn on queer identity & polyamory… but first she answers a viewer question about how to handle the romantic feelings she has for her best friend. Please rate & review to tell us what you love! (Head to youtube.com/realitybytes for the video version of this episode.)

episodes.summary: Welcome to REALITY BYTES, a new show about sex, love, relationships & dating in the digital age, hosted by best friends Stephanie Beatriz (Brooklyn Nine-Nine’s Rosa Diaz) & Courtney Kocak (writer on Amazon’s Danger & Eggs). Check out this teaser & look forward to full episodes COMING 9/20 – subscribe & tune in every Tuesday!
